org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor

类 JobLeaderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.taskexecutor.JobLeaderService

  • public class JobLeaderService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service has the responsibility to monitor the job leaders (the job manager which is leader for a given job) for all registered jobs. Upon gaining leadership for a job and detection by the job leader service, the service tries to establish a connection to the job leader. After successfully establishing a connection, the job leader listener is notified about the new job leader and its connection. In case that a job leader loses leadership, the job leader listener is notified as well.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private class  JobLeaderService.JobManagerLeaderListener
      Leader listener which tries to establish a connection to a newly detected job leader.
      private static class  JobLeaderService.JobManagerRetryingRegistration
      Retrying registration for the job manager <--> task manager connection.
      private static class  JobLeaderService.State
      Internal state of the service.

    • 字段概要

      High availability services to create the leader retrieval services from.
      private JobLeaderListener jobLeaderListener
      Job leader listener listening for job leader changes.
      private java.util.Map<JobID,Tuple2<LeaderRetrievalService,JobLeaderService.JobManagerLeaderListener>> jobLeaderServices
      The leader retrieval service and listener for each registered job.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private java.lang.String ownerAddress
      Address of the owner of this service.
      private TaskManagerLocation ownLocation
      Self's location, used for the job manager connection.
      private RpcService rpcService
      Rpc service to use for establishing connections.
      private JobLeaderService.State state
      Internal state of the service.

        Internal state of the service.

        Address of the owner of this service. This address is used for the job manager connection.

        Rpc service to use for establishing connections.

    • 方法详细资料

      • start

        public void start(java.lang.String initialOwnerAddress,
                  RpcService initialRpcService,
                  HighAvailabilityServices initialHighAvailabilityServices,
                  JobLeaderListener initialJobLeaderListener)
        Start the job leader service with the given services.
        参数:
        initialOwnerAddress - to be used for establishing connections (source address)
        initialRpcService - to be used to create rpc connections
        initialHighAvailabilityServices - to create leader retrieval services for the different jobs
        initialJobLeaderListener - listening for job leader changes

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Stop the job leader services. This implies stopping all leader retrieval services for the different jobs and their leader retrieval listeners.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while stopping the service

      • containsJob

        public boolean containsJob(JobID jobId)
        Check whether the service monitors the given job.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job
        返回:
        True if the given job is monitored; otherwise false

      • removeJob

        public void removeJob(JobID jobId)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Remove the given job from being monitored by the job leader service.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job to remove from monitoring
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurred while stopping the leader retrieval service and listener

      • addJob

        public void addJob(JobID jobId,
                   java.lang.String defaultTargetAddress)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Add the given job to be monitored. This means that the service tries to detect leaders for this job and then tries to establish a connection to it.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job to monitor
        defaultTargetAddress - of the job leader
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while starting the leader retrieval service
